text:
8.5. Multivariate Multi-step CNN Models 117
We may use the last three time steps from each of the three time series as input to the
model, and predict the next time steps of each of the three time series as output. The ﬁrst
sample in the training dataset would be the following.
Input:
10, 15, 25
20, 25, 45
30, 35, 65
Listing 8.73: Example input for the ﬁrst sample.
Output:
40, 45, 85
50, 55, 105
Listing 8.74: Example output for the ﬁrst sample.
